channel.title: data-science on Mind the Math
channel.description: Recent content in data-science on Mind the Math

item.title: Metrics Menagerie: Understanding Metrics for Scientific and ML Applications
item.description: Learn the mathematics behind formal metrics, distance calculations, and how to measure differences in distributions. Understand common metrics used across scientific disciplines and machine learning applications and how they relate to one another.

item.title: Digital Image Processing with Python
item.description: Learn the basics of digital image processing with Python, including the math behind images and common transformations.
